message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can work things out from here.
My turn! Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is too much. Let's try 70/30, and see if we can reach a deal before inflation eats away more of our money.
This is getting us nowhere. Let's be practical and split it 50/50. A fair deal for both of us.
